item.author: Chloe
item.description: 1. Install Hugo Windows： First install choco package manager, run cmd under administrator privileges and execute the following command: 1 2 3 4 powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command "iex ((new-object net.webclient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))" # Set environment variables SET PATH=%PATH%;%ALLUSERSPROFILE%\chocolatey\bin Then use choco to install hugo: choco install hugo -confirm MacOs： Use the brew command to install: brew install hugo Linux： Install using the snap command:
